alert.note: Alert for Livingston (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 02 at 9:06PM CST until February 03 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Treacherous travel tonight due to areas of blowing and drifting snow, mainly in rural locations. Light snow is possible on Thursday morning with accumulations up to 2 inches in the far southeast part of the county. * WHERE...Livingston County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST Thursday, with conditions improving through the day Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow covered roads and slippery road conditions due to blowing snow tonight. Some of this may continue on Thursday morning and impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.
